example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Thomson played outfield and third base until 1960 , [*-1] posting a lifetime .270 batting average and chalking up 264 home runs before [*-2] retiring and going into paper-goods sales .

example.name: passive
example.text: `` We got calls from big block houses asking us if we want [*-2] to make bids on anything , '' said [*T*-1] Mr. Weisman , who , [*-4] happy with his returns on investments chalked [*] up earlier , [*T*-3] declined the offers .
